I have been on metphormin for abt a yr. For diabetes. I had poly cystic ovaries. Hadn't conceived in 5 yrs. 2 months after my fiance came home from iraq I got pregnant. Doc said the metphormin is also used for fertility. So it worked out. 18 Weeks pregnant and still on the met phormin.
How much mg. Do u girls take?
